title: Strengthening Leadership Practical Competencies: Information Theory and Optimization Problems: Theory and Applications

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Explain core concepts of information theory-based optimization problems (information bottlenecks, privacy funnels)
Develop the ability to analyze associations with information-theoretic coding problems (hypothesis testing, noise source coding)
Design strategies to solve bottleneck problems using various mutual information measures (f-divergence, Arimoto mutual information)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
